title: China boy, 14, acts like ancient scholar, turns bedroom into museum of artefacts
description: A 14-year-old Chinese boy who turned his bedroom into a small history museum and spoke like an ancient scholar has attracted an army of followers online.The secondary school student from central China’s Henan province, Xie Zhaoyutong, loves ancient Chinese history and literature and has filled his bedroom with his antique collections.A recent video of Xie passionately introducing his collections went viral online. It attracted 837,000 likes and 40,000 comments.Xie collects pottery, china,...

title: The ancient waterway built by Romans that runs for miles throughout Cambridgeshire
description: A Roman-era boat and pottery were found near the artificial waterway in the 1990s.

title: Gita in Everyday Life – Ancient Wisdom, Modern Relevance
description: On Gita Jayanthi, spiritual teachers highlight the Bhagavad Gita’s modern relevance, offering guidance for stress, purpose, mental discipline and harmony. They recommend simple daily practices—chanting the Hare Krishna Maha Mantra and reading one verse—to bring clarity, peace and spiritual connection.

title: Top​‍​‌‍​‍‌​‍​‌‍​‍‌ Ancient Temples in India: Architectural Wonders You Need to See
description: India’s ancient temples are more than places of worship—they are living history and its cultural heritage. From the Brihadeeswarar Temple in the south to Kedarnath in the Himalayas, these temples show India’s timeless culture and incredible architecture. Here are the top ancient temples in India that you must visit atleast once.

title: In battered Lebanon, an ancient Christian community awaits the new pope | CNN
description: A monastery overlooking the Mediterranean will be one of the stops on Pope Leo XIV’s three-day visit to Lebanon, a country of complex sectarian politics and long-running conflict.
